column3: 11:40am. We managed to get a spot in the tiny parking lot
column4: and joined the line of patrons. We were fortunate enough to get in the door
column5: although it was still muggy. The line snaked out the door even before noon
column6: yet was moving decently fast - though I assume not quickly enough for the guy who
column8: had been visiting his friends and needed to fly out soon - but clearly not before visiting the Pit Room.
